## persist ##

**Interface:** `/cache/persist`

**Method:** `GET`

**Parameter:** 

*  **key** (Required)  

This Interface is an proxy interface for `/hustcache/persist`. See more details in [here](../../hustdb/hustcache/persist.md).  

**Sample:**

    curl -i -X GET "http://localhost:8082/cache/persist?key=test_key"
